value.title: DHS report accuses China of hiding coronavirus info so it could hoard supplies
value.excerpt: The report says that in January of this year, Beijing dramatically increased its imports and decreased its exports of medical supplies.

images.title: DHS report accuses China of hiding coronavirus info so it could hoard supplies

value.title: China imprisons ex-journalist for 15 years to 'punish him for his political speech,' activists say
value.excerpt: A Chinese former journalist has been sentenced to 15 years in prison on allegations that he attacked China’s ruling Communist Party, activists say.

images.title: China imprisons ex-journalist for 15 years to 'punish him for his political speech,' activists say

value.title: Pompeo Ties Coronavirus to China Lab, Despite Spy Agencies’ Uncertainty
value.excerpt: The secretary of state cited “enormous evidence” that the virus came from a research laboratory in Wuhan, backing an assertion by President Trump.

images.title: Pompeo Ties Coronavirus to China Lab, Despite Spy Agencies’ Uncertainty

value.title: White House officials blame China for coronavirus pandemic
value.excerpt: Trump administration officials continued to blame China on Sunday for the global coronavirus pandemic. and subsequent economic fallout. This comes as mixed messages surface about reopening the U.S. economy.

images.title: White House officials blame China for coronavirus pandemic

value.title: DHS Report Accuses China of 'Intentionally Concealing Severity' of Coronavirus Outbreak to Hoard Medical Supplies
value.excerpt: Beijing increased imports and decreased exports of medical supplies while downplaying the severity of the virus, according to the analysis.

images.title: DHS Report Accuses China of 'Intentionally Concealing Severity' of Coronavirus Outbreak to Hoard Medical Supplies

value.title: China hid severity of coronavirus to hoard supplies, according to DHS report
value.excerpt: Department of Homeland Security intelligence report said China covered up the extent of the coronavirus outbreak — and how contagious the disease is — to stock up on medical supplies needed to respond to it.

images.title: China hid severity of coronavirus to hoard supplies, according to DHS report

value.title: US intelligence documents accuse China of covering up coronavirus outbreak severity to hoard supplies
value.excerpt: The report also says China held off informing the World Health Organization that the coronavirus "was a contagion" for much of January so it could order medical supplies from abroad.

images.title: US intelligence documents accuse China of covering up coronavirus outbreak severity to hoard supplies

value.title: Cruz says coronavirus pandemic shows China is greatest geopolitical threat to US
value.excerpt: Texas, argued Sunday that the United States needs to reassess its relationship with China in the wake of the coronavirus pandemic.

value.title: Trump administration terminates funding of coronavirus bat research in China
value.excerpt: The Trump administration has cut funding for U.S. nonprofit research into coronaviruses in bats. The renowned EcoHealth Alliance saw its $3.7 grant revoked over their ties to the Wuhan Institute of Virology,

value.title: Sieren's China: After coronavirus, Beijing won't be economic savior
value.excerpt: Consumption in China is only picking up slowly, not least because of highly indebted private households. Beijing still has some stimulus leeway, but Western economies are unlikely to benefit, says Frank Sieren.

images.title: Sieren's China: After coronavirus, Beijing won't be economic savior

value.title: Trump can’t blame China for his own coronavirus failures
value.excerpt: That would seem to be the logic of the China hawks who demand that China be punished because the novel coronavirus originated there. The Post reports that “senior U.S. officials are beginning to explore proposals for punishing or demanding financial compensation from China for its handling of the coronavirus pandemic.

value.title: Pompeo blasts China for suppressing coronavirus information, call it a 'classic Communist disinformation effort'
value.excerpt: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo laid harsh blame on China on Sunday for engaging in what he called a “classic Communist disinformation effort” and for working “to make sure the world didn’t learn in a timely fashion” about the coronavirus outbreak.

images.title: Pompeo blasts China for suppressing coronavirus information, call it a 'classic Communist disinformation effort'

value.title: Mike Pompeo Confirms China Sought to Cover Up COVID-19 Severity, 'Enormous Evidence' Virus Originated in Wuhan Lab
value.excerpt: The U.S. secretary of state Mike Pompeo said there's "enormous evidence" that COVID-19 originated in China's Wuhan Institute of Virology and the Chinese government went to great lengths to intentionally conceal the severity of the outbreak.

images.title: Mike Pompeo Confirms China Sought to Cover Up COVID-19 Severity, 'Enormous Evidence' Virus Originated in Wuhan Lab

value.title: From creators of ‘Saddam’s WMDs’? West-compiled dossier ‘targets China Covid-19 cover-up’

value.title: Global Backlash Builds Against China Over Coronavirus

value.title: 'Once Upon a Virus': China mocks U.S. coronavirus response in Lego-like animation

value.title: Harbin city shuts eateries, coronavirus curbs ease elsewhere in China
value.excerpt: A northeastern Chinese city of 10 million people struggling with currently the country's biggest coronavirus cluster shut dine-in services on Saturday, as the rest of China eases restrictions designed to hamper the spread of the disease.

value.title: How China uses its massive surveillance apparatus to track its citizens, keep them in line
